verses.name: Deuteronomy 3:20
verses.text: Until the Lord have given rest unto your brethren, as well as unto you, and until they also possess the land which the Lord your God hath given them beyond Jordan: and then shall ye return every man unto his possession, which I have given you.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 3:21
verses.text: And I commanded Joshua at that time, saying, Thine eyes have seen all that the Lord your God hath done unto these two kings: so shall the Lord do unto all the kingdoms whither thou passest.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 3:22
verses.text: Ye shall not fear them: for the Lord your God he shall fight for you.
